name: Bad Balls
description:
It's time to use your brain and find a way to stop the bad guys!

There is always someone who doesn't follow the rules or does something bad.

Your goal is to draw some lines and use the ball to stop them! You will need your intelligence and imagination to solve these puzzles and figure out what they were doing!

You'll surely love this game once you get how it works!

Features:
*Free to play, play it anywhere anytime.
*Suitable for all ages
*Simple rules but a little difficult to clear the level, you'll find the addiction
*Very interesting animations and story background.
